title: Cast us not out: a film about old age
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Aging
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Aged - Institutional care
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Aged - Home care
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community organization

description: Examines the plight of the old in our society, showing the work that is being done by such organizations as the Jewish Welfare Board to alleviate the problem. Experts present the harsh facts of aging and stress the unwillingness of society to confront them. Considers some of the problems of institutional care.
